channel.title: Lurk-Scape [Partly Open Source] -- Even if it is bad. -.-
channel.description:
Well after many attempts to make a New-School delta. I finally found the right client. So New-School delta, with a small cache though.
Base: SpadeScape Dev: Me, along with some help from Randqm and Mopar People.
So Far: (Adding the skills in as I finish them.)
[center][color=green]Skills: [IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Herblore-icon.png[/img]Herblore: Source: http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Herblore Snippet: Decanting: http://pastebin.com/695w1pqh Snippet: Making Potions: http://pastebin.com/Fguv2eCw Details: Pretty Much Finished, maybe a couple more pots needed to be added in. Nothing major.
Other Details:
Forums Finished. Basic smf forums on a Host Gator webhost. Vps Hosted Server.
Thanks: Randqm imsuperman05 - helped me in the past, with other things. I felt like his name should be up here. Runewings317 Mopar Tuts
Other things.
I'm sorry, I don't know if mopar has an open source problem. I wanted to keep this development kinda open source by releasing the snippets with skills.

item.title: Lurk-Scape [Partly Open Source] -- Even if it is bad. -.-
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:19, topic:428467”][quote author=Ags Rush link=topic=531160.msg3881288#msg3881288 date=1326050464]

Helping?
You just copied from me,
at least remove your author credits

Okay.
[/quote]

Don’t take credits for others work, or I’m not going to help u anymore, with nothing[/quote]

Removed the author credits, and added yours.

Read full topic

item.title: Lurk-Scape [Partly Open Source] -- Even if it is bad. -.-
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Helping?
You just copied from me,
at least remove your author credits

Here is the one I posted: you just changed a few names

public class Testpots {
        
        public static int herbEmote = 363;
        public static long actionInterval = 1250;
        public static long lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();

    public static int[][] potCombinding = {
                /* pot used  */
        {3046, 3046, 3046, 3044, 179, 179, 179, 177, 3030, 3030, 3030, 3028, 6691, 6691, 6691, 6689, 143, 143, 143, 141, 173, 173, 173, 171, 119, 119, 119, 117, 161, 161, 
                161, 159, 167, 167, 167, 165, 137, 137, 137, 135, 125, 125, 125, 123, 149, 149, 149, 147},
                /* used with this pot */
                {3046, 3044, 3042, 3044, 179, 177, 175, 177, 3030, 3028, 3026, 3028, 6691, 6689, 6687, 6689, 143, 141, 139, 141, 173, 171, 169, 171, 119, 117, 115, 117, 161, 159, 
                        157, 159, 167, 165, 163, 165, 137, 135, 133, 135, 125, 123, 121, 123, 149, 147, 145, 147},
                /* added pot */
                {3044, 3042, 3040, 3044, 177, 175, 2446, 2446, 3028, 3026, 3024, 3024, 6685, 6687, 6685, 6685, 141, 139, 2434, 2434, 171, 169, 2444, 2444, 117, 115, 113, 113, 159, 
                                157, 2440, 2440, 165, 163, 2442, 2442, 135, 133, 2432, 2432, 123, 121, 2428, 2428, 147, 145, 2436, 2436},
        };
    public static String[] doseLeft = {"2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4",
        "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", "2", "3", "4", "4", };
    
        
        /* replace pots */
        public static void combinePots(int playerId, int firstId, int secondId, int newId) {
            final client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[playerId];
             c.deleteItem(firstId, 1);
             c.deleteItem(secondId, 1);
             c.addItem(newId, 1);
             c.addItem(229, 1);
     }
        public static void combineAction(final int playerId, final int ArrayIndex) {
            final client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[playerId];
        
        if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval)
            return;
        
        int Pot1 = potCombinding[0][ArrayIndex];
        int Pot2 = potCombinding[1][ArrayIndex];
        int newPot = potCombinding[2][ArrayIndex];
        String doses = doseLeft[ArrayIndex];
        
            c.setAnimation(herbEmote);
            lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
                combinePots(playerId, Pot1, Pot2, newPot);
                c.sM("You have combined the liquid into "+doses+" doses.");
        }
}

Read full topic

Thank you to RandQm(Lorenzo) and Runewings317(317). They both helped.

item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:9, topic:428467”]if (isWrittenByAgsRush) {
return;
}

i mean seriously, that is nasty. Just… learn some more. Herblore is just… nasty as hell. I agree with `SJ_. If you aren’t going to do it right, don’t do it at all.[/quote]

If you are going to act immaturely, and not tell me how to write it, then don’t reply to the thread. You have no business. At least one person told me to use multidimensional arrays. Which I’m going to learn how to write, that or I will use enums. Everyone starts somewhere, so fucking lay off.

Read full topic

item.title: Lurk-Scape [Partly Open Source] -- Even if it is bad. -.-
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

First of all, ‘programming’ runescape private servers, really isn’t programming at all. You can barely even consider this programming, so if you want to learn to actually program go do something else.

Thank you for repeating me. The only reason I’m doing this, is to learn some of the outreaches of the syntax. I’ve written applets, and stuff before. My knowledge of programming began a few months ago.

Read full topic
item.source: Lurk-Scape [Partly Open Source] -- Even if it is bad. -.-

item.title: Lurk-Scape [Partly Open Source] -- Even if it is bad. -.-
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

I could give a flying fuck if half the community is pissed or not. And quite frankly, who cares about my expectations? You should at least care if your code is efficient enough, because I see you’re trying to fight lag, the only thing your shitty code will cause is lag.

Again, i don’t care what you think of my code or how it’s written. I’m just glad it’s my code. I don’t expect anything more then 30 players from this server so fighting lag really isn’t that big of a deal. This is more of a learning process then anything. Real life code has nothing to do with private server coding, but at least it’s programming practice.

Read full topic

If I wanted my classes written to your expectations, i would of just messaged you. So the fact that you don’t find them satisfying doesn’t bother me in the least. I didn’t think this would make everyone happy, for one thing it’s delta. That’s half the community pissed right there.
